title: Replace hero image with a more cartoony cute illustration

requirements.text: Add a new more cartoony cute hero image as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and ensure it can be loaded directly via `/assets/generated/...` without relying on the backend.

quotes: try a different one more cartoony

acceptanceCriteria: A new cartoony hero image file exists in `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the exact filename specified in this build request.
The image is accessible at runtime via an `` URL and loads successfully in the browser network tab (no 404).

requirements.text: Update `frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx` to use the new cartoony hero image filename in the main hero photo `` (currently `src="/assets/generated/cute-hero-photo.dim_1600x2000.jpg"`).

quotes: try a different one more cartoony

acceptanceCriteria: `HeroSection` references the new cartoony image path in its main photo `src`.
On page load, the hero section displays the new cartoony image and does not fall back to the "Photo coming soon" placeholder when the asset exists.

constraints: Do not serve images via the backend; all images must be static assets in `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
Keep the existing hero image fallback behavior (show the placeholder only when the hero image fails to load).
Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or the immutable hook entrypoints listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing quiz behavior, questions, scoring, or celebration animations.
Changing site navigation structure or section order.

required: Cartoony cute character-style hero portrait illustration with warm pastel colors and simple shapes (cute-hero-photo-cartoony.dim_1600x2000.jpg)
